name: Peyote Shooter
description:
Eating a full jar of peyote jam alone in the desert is a bad idea.
When you don't look at them, cacti try to sneak into your tent !

  • Arrows - Move
  • A - Shoot
  • B - Reload

Made on 48 hours for the micro Game Jame "El Confitour".
Post-jam : new UI, better hitboxes, better spawn
Done with gbdk-2020.
